body: Currently have to click the minus button to remove the last instance of a card from the deck. Maybe look at RMB double-click or even plain old LMB double click as an alternative confirmation action.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: RMB double-click to remove card from deck.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on October 01, 2014 14:42:54_

Currently have to click the minus button to remove the last instance of a card from the deck. Maybe look at RMB double-click or even plain old LMB double click as an alternative confirmation action.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=706_
